Sentencas: The amount of food waste generated annually has increased due to rapid urbanization.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a food waste plasma gasification-based multigeneration system with dehumidification and carbon capture

Sentencas: Food waste that is not effectively treated not only pollutes the environment but also endangers human health indirectly.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a food waste plasma gasification-based multigeneration system with dehumidification and carbon capture

Sentencas: To realize the resource treatment of food waste, a novel combined cooling, heating, power, and dehumidification system based on food waste plasma gasification (PG) is proposed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a food waste plasma gasification-based multigeneration system with dehumidification and carbon capture

Sentencas: First, the PG and solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) models are validated, and then energy analysis and exergy analysis of the hybrid system are conducted.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a food waste plasma gasification-based multigeneration system with dehumidification and carbon capture

Sentencas: Finally, the influence of crucial parameters on energy output and efficiency is analyzed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a food waste plasma gasification-based multigeneration system with dehumidification and carbon capture

Sentencas: It was found that the net electrical, thermal, and exergy efficiencies of the hybrid system were 54.60%, 84.22%, and 51.15%, respectively, under the designed conditions.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a food waste plasma gasification-based multigeneration system with dehumidification and carbon capture

Sentencas: The moisture removal rate, humidity efficiency, and CO2 removal rate of the hybrid system were 20.16 g/kg, 93.66%, and 97.17%, respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a food waste plasma gasification-based multigeneration system with dehumidification and carbon capture

Sentencas: The largest part of the exergy destruction was that of the plasma gasifier that accounted for approximately 35.45% of the total exergy destruction related to the plasma torch's high power consumption.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a food waste plasma gasification-based multigeneration system with dehumidification and carbon capture

Sentencas: This system could efficiently and cleanly convert food waste into energy and could provide a new method for the efficient utilization of food waste.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a food waste plasma gasification-based multigeneration system with dehumidification and carbon capture
